title: Sources: Anthony bought out, looks to join Bucks
author: Shams Charania

title: Skenes, Skubal selected as ASG starting pitchers
description: Paul Skenes of the Pittsburgh Pirates and Tarik Skubal of the Detroit Tigers have been named the All-Star Game starting pitchers for the National League and American League, respectively.

title: Absorbing Sinner-Alcaraz rivalry set for next chapter
description: Core talent, contrasting personalities and classic matches - Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz resume their rivalry in the Wimbledon final.

title: 'Who would have expected that?' - Swiatek triumphs on grass
description: Few would have predicted Iga Swiatek's best Grand Slam result so far this season would come at Wimbledon - including herself.

title: Cowboys 1st-round pick has one season to avoid bust label, perhaps one training camp
description: A rookie season so bad that the leash is going to be short, but a new staff could renew hope.

title: The clock is ticking and stakes are rising for unsigned Saints rookie QB Tyler Shough
description: In the same boat as Tyler Shough, Chargers rookie Tre Harris has become a training camp holdout. Will the Saints QB be next, and what's the holdup?

title: Taylor completes Serrano trilogy as Marshall suffers upset defeat
description: Katie Taylor beat Amanda Serrano by unanimous decision to defend the undisputed super-lightweight championship and complete a clean sweep of three victories in their trilogy.

title: 'Drama, theatre, joy' - 'X-factor' Archer makes intoxicating Lord's return
description: It took Jofra Archer just three balls to send Lord's wild.
